module.name: jointsAwareness
module.description: Stream the 3d location of the iCub joints (default: both arms + torso) in root reference frame, as well as their projection on the image from the camera (default: left) and thee projection of potential objects.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Stream the 3d location of the iCub joints (default: both arms + torso) in root reference frame, as well as their projection on the image from the camera (default: left). Provide also the object projections by parsing iol2opc buffered port about object location.
